message:
Well done, {first_name}. You are all setup, let's explore Malaysia together ❤️🇲🇾
 I can help with:
🍽 Find food you'll love  
🧭 Guide you anywhere around Peninsular Malaysia  
📅 Plan your day, even if you've got 3 hours only
🎁 And... unlock local deals just for you
 What do you want to do first?
☑ Food Near Me
☑ How to Get Somewhere
☑ Plan My Day
☑ View My Deals
